verses.roman:
tapana-miśra, candraśekhara,--doṅhāre mililā
tāṅra ṭhāñi prabhura kathā sakala-i śunilā

synonyms: tapana-miśra—Tapana Miśra; candra-śekhara—Candraśekhara; doṅhāre mililā—he met both; tāṅra ṭhāñi—from him; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kathā—topics; sakala-i—all; śunilā—they heard.
translation: When he met Tapana Miśra and Candraśekhara in Vārāṇasī, they both heard from him about topics concerning Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
